function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low representation of women in the study may skew the results and impact the generalizability of findings.","Impact":"The study results may not accurately represent the entire population, leading to biased conclusions.","Mitigation":"Ensure a balanced representation of both men and women in future studies to improve the accuracy of findings.","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Participants in the study","Owner":"Research institutions, study organizers"},{"Description":"High levels of misinformation about COVID-19 among participants may lead to incorrect beliefs and behaviors regarding the disease.","Impact":"Misinformation can contribute to ineffective prevention efforts and increased transmission of the virus within the community.","Mitigation":"Provide targeted education and communication campaigns to dispel myths and promote accurate information about COVID-19.","Technologies":"Educational materials, social media platforms for dissemination of accurate information","People":"Participants in the study, general community","Owner":"Health authorities, community organizations"},{"Description":"Overwhelming news exposure and reliance on TV and internet for information may impact participants' understanding of COVID-19 and influence their behaviors.","Impact":"Excessive exposure to news and misinformation may lead to fear, anxiety, and misunderstanding about COVID-19, affecting adherence to preventive measures.","Mitigation":"Implement media literacy programs and provide access to reliable and accurate sources of information to counteract misinformation and reduce fear.","Technologies":"Media literacy resources, access to reliable information sources","People":"Participants in the study, general community","Owner":"Educational institutions, media organizations"}]}
